drug.name: Aminobenzoic acid
drug.description: A member of the vitamin B complex. It used to be common in sunscreening agents until found to also be a sensitizer. The potassium salt is used therapeutically in fibrotic skin disorders.
drug.synthesis-reference: Si-Joon Lee, Hee-Young Jung, "Alpha-tocopherol 4-aminobenzoic acid ester compounds and method for preparing the same." U.S. Patent US6222051, issued January, 1986.

classification.description: This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as aminobenzoic acids. These are benzoic acids containing an amine group attached to the benzene moiety.

product.name: Neutral C + Coenzyme Q10 Plus Vitamins & Minerals
Presun 15 Lotion
product.labeller: Westwood Squibb, Division Of Bristol Myers Squibb Canada Inc.

mixture.name: Neutral C + Coenzyme Q10 Plus Vitamins & Minerals
mixture.ingredients: Aminobenzoic acid + Calcium ascorbate + Cyanocobalamin + Folic acid + Magnesium + Potassium + Pyridoxine + Selenious acid + Ubidecarenone

category.category: Protectives Against UV-Radiation for Topical Use

atc-code.level: Protectives against UV-radiation for topical use

drug-interaction.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Sildenafil can be decreased when used in combination with Aminobenzoic acid.

target.name: p-hydroxybenzoate hydroxylase
target.organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa (strain ATCC 15692 / PAO1 / 1C / PRS 101 / LMG 12228)

article.citation: Overington JP, Al-Lazikani B, Hopkins AL: How many drug targets are there? Nat Rev Drug Discov. 2006 Dec;5(12):993-6.
Imming P, Sinning C, Meyer A: Drugs, their targets and the nature and number of drug targets. Nat Rev Drug Discov. 2006 Oct;5(10):821-34.
